Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The financial savings achieved through various cost-saving initiatives.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Cost Savings from Maintenance Activities

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The average time from when a purchase order is placed to when the goods are received.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Time to Process Purchase Orders / Number of Purchase Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The average time taken by suppliers to deliver goods after receiving a purchase order.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Supplier Lead Time / Number of Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The return on investment from procurement activities.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Cost Savings from Procurement Activities / Total Procurement Costs) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of contracts that adhere to agreed terms and conditions.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Contracts / Total Number of Contracts) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of defects found in products received from suppliers.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Defective Items / Total Items Received) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The difference between the actual purchase price and the budgeted price.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Actual Purchase Price - Standard Purchase Price) / Standard Purchase Price * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders delivered on or before the promised delivery date.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries / Total Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: A score reflecting the overall quality of products supplied by vendors.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Average Supplier Quality Rating

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of deliveries made on or before the scheduled delivery date.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries / Total Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The time from order placement to delivery from the supplier.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Supplier Lead Time / Number of Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: A score evaluating the risks associated with suppliers based on various factors.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Supplier Risk Score

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The total cost incurred due to defects, rework, and other quality issues.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Cost of Internal Failures + Cost of External Failures + Cost of Appraisal + Cost of Prevention) / Total Revenue * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: A rating based on the overall performance of suppliers against set criteria.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Average Supplier Performance Score

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of suppliers meeting contractual and regulatory requirements.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Supplier Actions / Total Supplier Actions) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: A measure of the overall relationship quality between the company and its suppliers.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Average Score from Supplier Relationship Surveys

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.KPIS: Delivery Performance to Customer Request Date
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of deliveries made on or before the requested delivery date.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Orders Delivered on Customer Request Date / Total Number of Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The average cost of freight per unit shipped.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Freight Cost / Total Units Shipped

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders delivered on or before the promised delivery date.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries / Total Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The variability in transit times for shipments.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Standard Deviation of Transit Times

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.KPIS: Logistics Cost as a Percentage of Sales
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The proportion of sales revenue spent on logistics activities.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Total Logistics Cost / Total Sales) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of total warehouse capacity that is utilized.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Used Warehouse Space / Total Warehouse Space) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders that are processed correctly without errors.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Orders / Total Number of Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The effectiveness of transportation operations in terms of cost and performance.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Distance Traveled / Total Fuel Consumed

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The rate at which inventory is sold and replaced over a specific period.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The average number of days inventory is held before it is sold.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Average Inventory / Cost of Goods Sold) * 365

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of times an item is out of stock when there is demand.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Stockouts / Total Number of Products) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The accuracy of inventory records compared to actual stock levels.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Inventory Counts / Total Inventory Counts) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The total cost of holding inventory including storage, insurance, and opportunity costs.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Total Inventory Holding Costs / Average Inventory Value) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The total time from receiving an order to delivering the product to the customer.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Order Fulfillment Time / Number of Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of inventory lost due to theft, damage, or errors.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Inventory Shrinkage / Total Inventory) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The minimum inventory level maintained to prevent stockouts.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Desired Service Level * Lead Time Demand * Standard Deviation of Lead Time Demand

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The efficiency of space use in the warehouse.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Warehouse Space Used for Storage / Total Warehouse Space) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders picked correctly.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Correctly Picked Items / Total Number of Items Picked) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The average time it takes for goods to move from the dock to storage in the warehouse.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Dock-to-Stock Time / Number of Shipments

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of total warehouse space that is actively used for storage.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Used Warehouse Space / Total Warehouse Space) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: A measure of how effectively labor resources are used in warehouse operations.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Total Output / Total Labor Hours)

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The total time from receiving an order to delivering the product to the customer.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Order Cycle Time / Number of Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The accuracy of inventory records compared to actual stock levels.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Inventory Counts / Total Inventory Counts) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products returned by customers.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Returned Items / Total Items Sold) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders delivered on or before the promised delivery date.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries / Total Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The average cost of freight per unit shipped.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Freight Cost / Total Units Shipped

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of shipments damaged during transportation.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Damaged Units / Total Units Shipped) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of available load capacity that is used.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Actual Load Volume / Total Load Capacity) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The effectiveness of fuel usage in transportation operations.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Distance Traveled / Total Fuel Consumed

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: A measure of the effectiveness of delivery operations based on various factors such as timeliness and quality.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries / Total Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The time taken for shipments to travel from the origin to the destination.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: Total Transit Time / Number of Shipments

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.EXPLANATION: The percentage of shipments that are correct in terms of quantity and items.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Shipments / Total Shipments) * 100
